programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Falling Man, Space Rocks, Missing Feet: A high-rise window washer somehow survives a 50-storey fall and ball-sized ice chunks fall from the sky. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Real Dragons: The team travels to Australia's Blue Mountains in search of evidence that the huge megalania lizard isn't really extinct.

programme.title: UFOs Declassified
programme.desc: Red Alert: During the Cold War, strange lights and unidentified objects put governments around the world on red alert. Could extra-terrestrials have been responsible? (2 of 6)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Atlantis Apocalypse: A volcanic eruption in Santorini 3,500 years ago caused a tsunami that destroyed a Minoan civilisation and prompted the Atlantis myth. (S3, ep 10)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Toxic Cloud: A toxic chemical cloud from an industrial accident could jeopardise an entire community within minutes, putting the lives of thousands of people at risk. (S3, ep 11)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 79)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry, Allen and Guy finally get their Buick Roadmaster, cruise to a Newbury car show, and do some wheeling and dealing. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Built For Pleasure Not Speed: Bidders Lesa and Jerry play their home-field advantage at auctions in Longview, where they lock horns with Jenny and Mary. (S5, ep 7)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Once A Pawn A Time In Hollywood: When a vintage Yellow Cab hat pulls into the shop, can Rick hail a fare deal? Next, a seller pops in with a gum ball machine. Will he stick to a fair price?

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: New Hire. Now Fire!: A roid-raging meathead threatens Seth's father; Ashley surprises everyone with a brand new hire. (S4, ep 10)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Seth vs Rich: Les orders Seth and Rich to clean up the whole warehouse, in order to make room for lots of new merchandise. (S4, ep 11)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Drop the Bomb: American Jewellery is celebrating its 30th anniversary and Les wants to put on a big party to enjoy this milestone. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: Alien Energy: From military radar to Navy aircraft, sightings of Unidentified Aerial Phenomena have become more frequent - leading to unprecedented acceptance of alien contact. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: The Black Knight: Is the satellite in Earth's orbit that astronauts discovered in 1998 the same one that Nikola Tesla detected back in 1899? (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: The Return: When a former ranch investigator and government official returns to help the team with a new experiment, it leads to a shocking revelation. (S4, ep 7)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Orb & Crash Debris, KGB UFOs and Aliens, and Superhuman reflexes: Is the strange silver orb in the sky a UFO? And is an infamous spy organisation's footage of aliens real? (S4, ep 4)

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice
programme.desc: WWII Warship Wreckage: A giant naval vessel is located on the bottom of the Norwegian Sea, while an ancient reptile-like creature is found in Canada. (S3, ep 10)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Never a Safe Bet: Jesse knows you don't strike it rich if you play it safe - so he gambles big on a risky bin. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Checkmate: A deadly bin puts all the buyers on edge, while Brandon and Lori square off against Scott and Chrissy in a bidding war that sends all strategy out the window. (S2, ep 3)

programme.desc: Henry Cole, Allen Millyard and Guy Willison try to find vintage finds to sell in Kempton. (S3, ep 1)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Cleo is determined to cure Clawdeen's homesickness in 'Cleo in the Kitchen', then in 'Case of the Missing Squeak', When Lagoona's beloved toy goes missing, Lagoona tracks down the culprit. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: A cricket ruins Dad's peaceful day in 'A Bug's Strife', then in 'All the Rage', after getting pummeled during dodgeball, Lincoln and the gang use Clyde's untapped rage without him knowing. (S6, ep 6)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The Action News Team aren't first with the stories in 'Scoop Snoop', then in 'Eye Can't ', to avoid a trip to the eye doctor, Lisa makes glasses that actually make her eyesight worse. (S6, ep 7)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The kids try to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal in 'Dine and Bash', then in 'Sofa, So Good', the kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning. (S6, ep 8)

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: Maddy's filmmaking ambitions go wild in 'Born to Direct', and then in 'The Wexler Deflection Conjecture', after Dr. Wexler quits science, Billy and Maddy must convince him to save the city. (S4, ep 4)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs Show: Gargamel plants a crystal ball to spy on the Smurfs, but they turn the tables on him with a fabricated drama. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: The Hula Hoop Contest: There's a new furry fellow in town: it's Alana, the Hawaiian hula hoop kitty, and she's ready to teach the Buffycats a game and organize the best hula contest ever! (S2, ep 51)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: The World's Tallest Hamburger: After seeing the Pawesome Book of World Records with Isotta, the Buffycats want to beat the 'tallest hamburger in the world' record. (S2, ep 52)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best must splat Bester's new pet in 'Best Fwends', then in 'The Trivialist Pursuit', Best and Bester go on a quest for a talking whale to prove they answered a game question correctly. (S1, ep 11)

programme.desc: Theodore's new toy is annoying Alvin and Simon in 'Talking Teddy', then in 'Principal Interest', Alvin is none-too thrilled about going back to school, until he sees the new Principal. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Eleanor decides to move in with Alvin and his brothers in 'Sister Act', then in 'Lil' T', Theodore posts a video of himself rapping on the Internet and it becomes a mega-hit! (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1975

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.desc: No Entrance!: As usual, Grizzy picks the door of the ranger's log cabin to go in and make himself comfortable, but this time it's impossible to enter! (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Coch a Glas yn cystadlu i baentio castell ac yn cwrdd â Phorffor. Red and Blue compete to colour a castle, and meet new arrival Purple.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Anifeiliaid anwes yw'r thema y tro hwn a down i nabod y gath, y mochyn cwta a'r bochdew. The theme this time is pets and we get to know about cats, guinea pigs and hamsters.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Er nad oedd o am i Fflopsi a Mopsi fynd efo fo ar un o'i anturiaethau, mae Guto'n darganfod bod yr efeilliaid yn gallu bod yn gwmni difyr iawn. Guto finds out his twin sisters can be fun!

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y môr-ladron sy'n ymuno â Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo'n gweld nad yw ei wy wedi ffrio yn hoff o gael ei chyffwrdd gan ei sbageti! Pablo goes to a café with his Mum and gets an egg and spaghetti hoops, but his food is upset - oh no!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Tro hwn, teithiwn yn ôl mewn hanes i ddysgu am gychod campus a sut wnaethon nhw lwyddo hwylio moroedd y byd. We travel back in time to learn about boats and how they sail the oceans.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'n ddiwrnod rasio yn Pentre Papur Pop ac mae Pip wedi dewis y cwrs! On today's poptastic adventure, it's the annual Pop Paper City go-kart race.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Ar y Newffion heddiw, mae cennin yn bwysig iawn i Gymru, ond beth mae'r statws PGI newydd yn ei olygu? Today: what does the new PGI status mean for leeks, about what about light pollution?

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae Seren yn creu darlun, mae'r Capten yn sylwi ar ddiferion paent ac mae Fflwff yn dysgu sut i stampio siapiau. Seren paints a picture and Fflwff learns to stamp shapes on canvas.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Stiw'n difaru rhoi ei deganau ar werth yn y sêl garej mae'r teulu'n ei chynnal. Stiw decides to sell some of his old toys at the family's garage sale, but regrets doing so afterwards.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae defaid du a gwyn Fflur ar goll! Wedi tipyn o ymdrech gan Jen, Jim, Bolgi a Cyw, mae'r gorlan yn llawn anifeiliaid du a gwyn. Fflur's black and white sheep are missing. Can anyone help?

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae masg hynafol yn gwneud i Maer Campus ymddwyn fel mwnci. All y Pawenlu ei achub o'r jyngl? An ancient mask makes Mayor Campus act monkeyish! Can the Paw Patrol save him from the jungle?

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymuno a chriw o syrffwyr ifanc yn Ninas Dinlle, garddio ar y rhandir yng Nghaerdydd, a mynd ar helfa synhwyrau gyda Leisa, Cadi, Erin a Beca. More adventures in the open air.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cân fywiog a doniol am anifeiliaid a'u synau. A lively and entertaining song about animals and the sounds they make.

programme.title: Twm Twrch

programme.title: Budgie
programme.desc: Sunset mansions. Stars: Adam Faith, Iain Cuthbertson & Lynn Dalby. Budgie joins the world of show business after meeting Janey and Denzil. [S]

programme.title: The Heritage Chart Show with Mike Read
programme.desc: A TOTP style TV Show for Heritage Artists based on the Heritage Chart which is voted on in over 80 countries. Songs you love from popular artists, live and on video with the odd interview.

programme.title: The Story of Shirley Yorke
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Director: Maclean Rogers. Stars Dinah Sheridan, Derek Farr & John Robinson. Nurse Yorke assists her boss, Dr Napier, who is effecting a new treatment on the ailing wife of a Lord. [S]

programme.title: The Ice House
programme.desc: 1978. Horror. Directed by Derek Lister. Stars John Stride & Elizabeth Romilly. A recently divorced man seeks solace in a countryside retreat but does not find the comfort he was looking for. [S]

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Private Account. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Jesse White & Karen Sharpe. Bill Longley is trapped by a landslide but is rescued by Johhny Hinshaw who, he soon discovers, is on the run from the law. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Beatle Drive. 1963. Stars Barbara Mitchell, Hugh Walters & Annette Robertson. Georgie's inventive genius is put to a halt. Meanwhile, Lofty's sister pulls four boffins away from their studies. [S]

programme.title: Flight From Vienna
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Director: Denis Kavanagh. Stars John Bentley, Theodore Bikel & Donald Gray. When a Hungarian official asks for asylum in the west, he is forced to go back home to prove his sincerity. [S]

programme.title: Dead Man's Evidence
programme.desc: 1963. Crime drama directed by Francis Searle and starring Conrad Phillips and Jane Griffiths. Phillips stars as a British secret agent investigating the discovery of a dead, washed up frogman. [S]

programme.title: The Hangman Waits
programme.desc: 1947. Thriller. Director: A. Barr-Smith. Stars John Turnbull & Hylton Allen. This 1947 semi-documentary style featurette is a story of grisly murders by a cinema organist. [S]

programme.title: Third Party Risk
programme.desc: 1955. Crime. Directed by Daniel Birt. Stars Lloyd Bridges, Finlay Currie & Maureen Swanson. A man holidaying in Spain becomes inadvertently mixed up in a case of murder and microfilm smuggling. [S]

programme.title: The Tall Men
programme.desc: 1955. Western. Directed by Raoul Walsh. Stars Clark Gable, Jane Russell & Robert Ryan. Two brothers and their pompous employer make an arduous journey across the frontier driving a herd of cattle. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock: The Secret Weapon
programme.desc: 1942. Mystery. Directed by Roy William Neill. Stars Basil Rathbone, Nigel Bruce & Lionel Atwill. Sherlock Holmes must protect a scientist's invention from falling into the wrong hands. [S]

programme.title: Out of the Fog
programme.desc: 1962. Crime drama directed by Montgomery Tully. An ex-con is the prime suspect when a series of murders occur under a full moon. Every victim is a blonde young woman. Starring David Sumner. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts Get Culture. 1963. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Irene Ryan & Donna Douglas. The Clampetts are having no success with their neighbours and decide to get a taste of culture to fit in. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1955. The Stateless Man. Director: Paul Gherzo. Stars Frank Leighton, Robin Wentworth, Theodore Wilhelm, Tom Clegg, May Hallett & Anna Doran. A crime in London's dockland baffles the police.

programme.title: Dixon of Dock Green
programme.desc: Vagrant. 1976. Stars Jack Warner, John Carson & Bill Treacher. Someone is trying to kill Joe Conway but why should anyone wish to hunt down a homeless vagrant? [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Big Skate/Pannage. 1986. Jack Hargreaves recounts a trip to Shetland in search of large fish. In his second film, he witnesses pigs dealing with a bumper crop of acorns. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: Mike and Noel have everything from the lovely Debbie Reynolds to the bizarre world of The Alberts! There's also a superb reel of the last Maidstone Trolley Bus! And do you remember Beetle Drives? [S]

programme.title: Public Eye: Christmas Special
programme.desc: 1972. Drama. Horse and Carriage. Stars Alfred Burke, Pat Heywood & Tony Melody. Marker finds the season of goodwill a little hard to bear when a husband hires Marker to investigate his wife. [S]

programme.title: The Tell-Tale Heart
programme.desc: 1960. Horror. Directed by Ernest Morris. Stars Laurence Payne, Adrienne Corri & Dermot Walsh. A man is tortured by the sound of his friend's beating heart after killing him in a jealous rage. [S]

programme.title: Fedora
programme.desc: 1978. Drama. Director: Billy Wilder. Stars William Holden, Marthe Keller & Hildegard Knef. A down-on-his-luck Hollywood producer attempts to lure a famous but reclusive actress out of retirement. [S]

programme.title: Murphy's Law
programme.desc: 1986. Action. Directed by J. Lee Thompson. Stars Charles Bronson, Kathleen Wilhoite & Carrie Snodgress. A hardboiled LAPD cop must go on the run after being framed for the murder of his ex-wife. [S]

programme.title: Murphy's Law
programme.desc: 1986. Action. Directed by J. Lee Thompson. Stars Charles Bronson, Kathleen Wilhoite & Carrie Snodgress. A hardboiled LAPD cop must go on the run after being framed for the murder of his ex-wife. [S]

programme.title: The Spiritualist
programme.desc: 1948. Thriller. Director: Bernard Vorhaus. Stars Turhan Bey, Lynn Bari & Cathy O'Donnell. Christine thinks she can hear her late husband calling out of the surf on the beach one night. [S]

programme.title: Beyond The Truth
programme.desc: The Real Men In Black. A documentary about The allegations that the US government is working with an alien intelligence to genetically mutate humans is investigated. (S1, E05)

programme.title: Tell Me Another
programme.desc: Disasters, Humiliations & Embarrassing Moments In Their Personal & Professional Lives. 1976. Personal anecdotes as told to Dick Hills. This episode stars Diana Dors, Jimmy Jewel and Ted Ray. [S]

programme.title: Ticket To Paradise
programme.desc: 1961. Romance. Director: Francis Searle. Stars: Emrys Jones, Patricia Dainton & Denis Shaw. The film tells the story of romance between a travel agent and a tourist on holiday in Italy. [S]

programme.title: Beyond the Curtain
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Directed by Compton Bennett. Starring Richard Greene, Eva Bartok and Marius Goring. East German refugee Karen finds herself back at home when the flight she works on is forced down. [S]

programme.title: A Touch Of The Sun
programme.desc: 1956. Comedy. In London's swanky hotel the Royal Connaught, if you need anything ask for Mr. Darling (Frankie Howerd) the ' Mr. Fix-it'. Stars: Ruby Murray, Alfie Bass & Dennis Price. [S]

programme.title: Lunch Hour
programme.desc: 1961. Comedy. Shirley Anne Field gives a great performance as a young designer on the brink of an affair with a married executive (Robert Stephens) at the company she works for. Stars Kay Walsh. [S]

programme.title: Carry On Spying
programme.desc: 1964. Comedy. Directed by Gerald Thomas. Stars Kenneth Williams, Barbara Windsor & Bernard Cribbins. A British spy and his pupils are sent to track down a stolen top secret chemical formula. [S]

programme.title: Up In The World
programme.desc: 1956. Comedy. Director: John Paddy Carstairs. Stars Norman Wisdom, Maureen Swanson & Jerry Desmonde. A window cleaner works at a country estate where the owner's son is threatened by kidnappers. [S]

programme.title: The Long & The Short & The Tall
programme.desc: 1961. War. Directed by Leslie Norman. Stars Richard Todd, Laurence Harvey & Richard Harris. Based on the Willis Hall play. A British patrol in Burma are determined to avenge British prisoners. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: Solo For Sparrow. 1962. Directed by Gordon Flemyng. Stars Anthony Newlands, Glyn Houston & Michael Coles. A gang of thieves get caught up in a murder whilst trying to rob a jewellery store. [S]

programme.title: Man from Interpol
programme.desc: Odds On Murder. 1960. Stars Richard Stapley, Lisa Daniely & Bill Owen. Agent Smith investigates a threat to the life of jockey Tim Stout shortly before an important race. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Spell of Tut. 1966. Stars Adam West, Victor Buono & Marianna Hill. Batman and Robin battle the nefarious King Tut who plots to take over Gotham City with an ancient potion. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Special Edition. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Richard Bennet & Donald Bisset. A gang of career criminals believe they have the perfect alibi when they carry out a payroll robbery in Fleet Street. [S]

programme.title: Whistle and I'll Come to You
programme.desc: 2010. Horror. Directed by Andy De Emmony. Stars John Hurt, Gemma Jones & Lesley Sharp. A lonely retiree on a respite holiday encounters an apparition on a beach, which then begins to haunt him. [S]

programme.title: Love for Lydia
programme.desc: Episode 13. 1977. Stars Mel Martin, Christopher Blake & Irene Richard. Lydia struggles with her recovery. Meanwhile, Richardson reflects on all that has happened and must face his fears. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro offers some horrifying treats - an experiment gone wrong and a vicious alien predator. First up, is the 1958 sci-fi horror The Fly, which stars Vincent Price and Patricia Owens. [S]
